attributes.action: Reverse the decision on suspending grassroots football.
attributes.additional_details:
The benefits of grassroots sport is well documented. Children have suffered enough due to Covid-19 and should not have to have this positive part of their lives taken from them again. 

The decision to stop grassroots football will have a detrimental effect on many children's lives. This decision is contradictory to so much of the advice relating to young people and should be overturned as soon as possible.
attributes.background: Following Sir Patrick Vallance's comments that he has not seen any evidence of Covid-19 transmissions due to grassroots football, we ask that the government overturn their decision to suspend it during lockdown.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557169
